default.value: Neural Link Hive Integration System designed with comprehensive architecture including: 1) 6 core components (Signal Acquisition, Processing Pipeline, Decoder/Encoder, Hive Interface, Security Layer, Safety Monitor). 2) Real-time processing with <50ms latency. 3) Multi-layer safety system with emergency shutoff. 4) Support for 256 neural channels at 30kHz. 5) End-to-end encryption with neural signatures. 6) Python prototype successfully tested. Architecture document created at /workspaces/claude-code-flow/neural-link-system/design/system-architecture.md and working prototype at /workspaces/claude-code-flow/neural-link-system/implementation/architecture_prototype.py
